title: Meridian.New.World-CODEX
description:
Meridian.New.World-CODEX


CODEX PRESENTS: 

Merdan: New World

Release Date: 9/2014 
Protecton: Steam 
Dscs: 1 
Genre: RTS



Slip into the role of Daniel Hanson, commander of the first mission to
a remote planet called Meridian. Assured of the fact that the planet is
uninhabited, the unexpected reception of a distress call from the surface
could mean many things, none of which you are prepared for


- Burn or mount the .iso
- Run setup.exe and install
- copy crack from CODEX dir to installdir
- Play
